distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for giflib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-11490: Fixed a heap-based buffer overflow in DGifDecompressLine() (bsc#1094832)
- CVE-2021-40633: Fixed a denial of service from excessive memory (bsc#1200551)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The DGifDecompressLine function in dgif_lib.c in GIFLIB (possibly version 3.0.x), as later shipped in cgif.c in sam2p 0.49.4, has a heap-based buffer overflow because a certain "Private->RunningCode - 2" array index is not checked. This will lead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: A memory leak (out-of-memory) in gif2rgb in util/gif2rgb.c in giflib 5.1.4 allows remote attackers trigger an out of memory exception or denial of service via a gif format file.
notes.title: CVE description
